scripts.build-all: npm run build-win && npm run build-mac && npm run build-linux
scripts.build-win: pkg ./TouchPortalYTMusicV2/ytmd-tp.js --target node20-win-x64 --out-path ./builds/win/TouchPortalYTMusicV2 && resedit --in ./builds/win/TouchPortalYTMusicV2/ytmd-tp.exe --out ./builds/win/TouchPortalYTMusicV2/ytmd-tp-win.exe --icon 1,.\TouchPortalYTMusicV2/icon.ico --file-description "YouTube Music Desktop v2 Touch Portal Plugin" --set-product-name "YouTube Music Desktop v2 Touch Portal Plugin" && del /f /q builds\win\TouchPortalYTMusicV2-win.tpp && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\icon.png builds\win\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\icon.png && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp builds\win\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp && del /q /f builds\win\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\ytmd-tp.exe && cd builds\win && 7z -y a -tzip TouchPortalYTMusicV2-win.tpp TouchPortalYTMusicV2 && rmdir /s /q TouchPortalYTMusicV2
scripts.build-mac: pkg ./TouchPortalYTMusicV2/ytmd-tp.js --target node20-darwin-x64 --out-path ./builds/mac/TouchPortalYTMusicV2 && del /f /q builds\mac\TouchPortalYTMusicV2-mac.tpp && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\ytmd-tp.sh builds\mac\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\ytmd-tp.sh && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp builds\mac\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\icon.png builds\mac\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\icon.png && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp builds\mac\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp && cd builds\mac && 7z -y a -tzip TouchPortalYTMusicV2-mac.tpp TouchPortalYTMusicV2 && rmdir /s /q TouchPortalYTMusicV2
scripts.build-linux: pkg ./TouchPortalYTMusicV2/ytmd-tp.js --target node20-darwin-x64 --out-path ./builds/linux/TouchPortalYTMusicV2 && del /f /q builds\linux\TouchPortalYTMusicV2-linux.tpp && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\ytmd-tp.sh builds\linux\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\ytmd-tp.sh && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp builds\linux\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\icon.png builds\linux\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\icon.png && copy TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp builds\linux\TouchPortalYTMusicV2\entry.tp && cd builds\linux && 7z -y a -tzip TouchPortalYTMusicV2-linux.tpp TouchPortalYTMusicV2 && rmdir /s /q TouchPortalYTMusicV2
